content: समाहित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Brought together, assembled. {@--2@} Adjusted, settled. {@--3@} Composed, collected, calm (as mind.). {@--4@} Intent on, absorbed in, concentrated. {@--5@} Finished. {@--6@} Agreed upon. {@--7@} Arranged, disposed. {@--8@} Inferred. {@--9@} Accomplished, finished. {@--10@} Deposited, entrusted; see समाधा also. --तः A holy man. --तं Intentness, intent devotion (to any object).
